Practice 
I have been practicing law in Vietnam since 2014. My areas of expertise include 
corporate, foreign investment, banking, real estate, construction, employment 
and social media. I have litigated and arbitrated several commercial and labor 
disputes. Most recently, I have been working as an in-house legal consultant for 
an international corporation featuring live-streaming platforms. 
Notable Engagements in Vietnam 
 
Advised a foreign invested sub-contractor (a leading company in construction 
and construction materials) on issues regarding a building construction project 
with a value of USD 400 million. 
 
Advised a local authority on issues regarding an ODA waste-water treatment 
project. 
 
Advised and prepared negotiations on distributing telecommunication equipment 
between a leading global manufacturer and a local distributor with the estimated 
transaction value of VND 20 billion a year. 
 
Advised a foreign invested company (a leading mining company) regarding 
equity structure and foreign loans with a total transaction value of over USD 2 
million. 
 
Advised a foreign invested company (a leading Vietnamese telecommunication 
services company) on M&A and BCC transactions.





 
Advised a foreign invested company in a Contract for Construction– for Building

 
Advised a publicly listed company on securities issues and internal compliance. 


 
Represented a state owned company before a competent court in connection with 
a claim of over VND200 billion arising out of a good purchase agreement with 
other local companies. 
 
Represented a foreign invested company (a global leader in construction 
materials) before the Vietnam International Arbitration Centre (VIAC) in 
connection with a claim on payment of construction materials. 
 
Represented several employees before a competent court regarding disputes with 
their employer (a transnational construction company) with a total claim of VND 
4.5 billion.
